verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1272>flee<s%> unto <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa;<s%> and he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H591>ship<s%> <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish:<s%> so he <S%H5414>paid<s%> the <S%H7939>fare<s%> thereof, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> into it, to <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them unto <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> sent <S%H2904>out<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H5591>tempest<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so that the <S%H591>ship<s%> was <S%H2803>like<s%> to be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>

Then the <S%H4419>mariners<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H430>god,<s%> and cast <S%H2904>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>wares<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H591>ship<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> to <S%H7043>lighten<s%> it <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them. But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was gone <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H5600>ship;<s%> and he <S%H7901>lay,<s%> and was fast <S%H7290>asleep.<s%>

So the <S%H7227>shipmaster<s%> <S%H2259><s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H4100>What<s%> meanest thou, O <S%H7290>sleeper?<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> if so <S%H194>be<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6245>think<s%> upon us, that we <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> for whose <S%H7945>cause<s%> <S%H4310><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is upon us. So they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> us, we pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> for whose <S%H834>cause<s%> <S%H4310><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is upon us; <S%H4100>What<s%> is thine <S%H4399>occupation?<s%> and <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> <S%H935>comest<s%> thou? <S%H4100>what<s%> is thy <S%H776>country?<s%> and of <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> art <S%H859>thou?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H595>I<s%> am a <S%H5680>Hebrew;<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land.

Then were the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3374><s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H5046>told<s%> them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee, that the <S%H3220>sea<s%> may be <S%H8367>calm<s%> <S%H4480>unto<s%> <S%H5921><s%> us? <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1980>wrought,<s%> and was <S%H5590>tempestuous.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Take me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and cast me <S%H2904>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> so shall the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be <S%H8367>calm<s%> <S%H4480>unto<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> for my <S%H7945>sake<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>tempest<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.

Nevertheless the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2864>rowed<s%> hard to <S%H7725>bring<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3004>land;<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1980>wrought,<s%> and was <S%H5590>tempestuous<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

Wherefore they <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> We beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> we beseech <S%H577>thee,<s%> let us <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H5315>life,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> hast <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> it <S%H2654>pleased<s%> thee.

So they took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> and cast him <S%H2904>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5975>ceased<s%> from her <S%H4480>raging.<s%> <S%H2197><s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3374><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly,<s%> and <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5087>made<s%> <S%H5088>vows.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1709>fish<s%> to swallow <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3124>Jonah.<s%> And <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H4578>belly<s%> of the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
